p: By 10 May 2020, 62 PLWH out of 5683 (1.09%) in the cohort had contacted the hospital reporting symptoms suggestive of COVID-19. Nine patients tested negative for SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR and alternative causes were: pneumococcal pneumonia ( n = 2), syphilis ( n = 2), urinary tract infection ( n = 2), tuberculosis ( n = 1), acute tonsillitis ( n = 1), and diabetic ketoacidosis ( n = 1). COVID-19 was confirmed in 42 cases and probable in 11 cases. No other viral respiratory infections concomitant to SARS-CoV-2 were found.
